author: m.kalinin
content:
TL;DR Because of the weak subjectivity (an inherent PoS property) one must verify the block root at the weak subjectivity checkpoint when bootstrapping or starting a node after being offline for a while. This verification can be done in many different ways, asking your friend about the root at the checkpoint, double checking with services and block explorers. Ideally, you do several ways to prove the same checkpoint to make this process BFT. Without WS checkpoint verification syncing with the network is insecure in PoS disregarding whether it's a sync from genesis or from a state at the WS checkpoint.

You also might want to read this https://notes.ethereum.org/Mp5Iv4N0Qb-d6KZvNuBspg
